amendment.description: Amendments en bloc comprised of amendments numbered 64, 67, 69, 70, 72, 74, 77, 78, 79, 82, 83, 102, 107 and 126 printed in House Report 113-108. See page D568 of the Congressional Record of Thursday, June 13, 2013, for description of en bloc amendments.
amendment.purpose: An amendment comprised of Part B amendments Nos. 64, 67, 69, 70, 72, 74, 77, 78, 79, 82, 83, 102, 107 and 126 printed in House Report 113-108.

action.text: Amendments en bloc (A020) offered by Mr. Thornberry.
On agreeing to the Thornberry amendments (A020) Agreed to by voice vote.
